parts.text: {"word":"unir","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"verb","definition":"(フランス語) 結合する、団結させる、結びつける","english_definition":"(French) to unite, join, combine, link","examples":[{"sentence":"Unir nos forces pour atteindre un objectif commun.","translation":"共通の目標を達成するために、我々の力を結集する。","english_translation":"To unite our forces to achieve a common goal."},{"sentence":"Unir deux morceaux de bois avec de la colle.","translation":"2つの木片を接着剤で結合する。","english_translation":"To join two pieces of wood with glue."}],"collocations":["s'unir (自再帰動詞): 団結する、協力する","unir ses efforts (努力を結合する)","unir des forces (力を合わせる)","unir un pays (国を統一する)"],"synonyms":["joindre","assembler","lier","connecter","fusionner","réunir"],"antonyms":["séparer","diviser","dissocier"],"related_words":["union (名詞: 結合、団結、組合)","uni (形容詞: 結合された、単一の)"]}],"etymology":{"value":"ラテン語の「unire」(結合する)に由来","priority":"★★★"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/y.niʁ/","syllables":"u-nir"},"inflection":{"verb_forms":{"indicative":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"unis","2nd_person_singular":"unis","3rd_person_singular":"unit","1st_person_plural":"unissons","2nd_person_plural":"unissez","3rd_person_plural":"unissent"},"imperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"unissais","2nd_person_singular":"unissais","3rd_person_singular":"unissait","1st_person_plural":"unissions","2nd_person_plural":"unissiez","3rd_person_plural":"unissaient"},"past_historic":{"1st_person_singular":"unis","2nd_person_singular":"unis","3rd_person_singular":"unit","1st_person_plural":"unîmes","2nd_person_plural":"unîtes","3rd_person_plural":"unirent"},"future":{"1st_person_singular":"unirai","2nd_person_singular":"uniras","3rd_person_singular":"unira","1st_person_plural":"unirons","2nd_person_plural":"unirez","3rd_person_plural":"uniront"}},"subjunctive":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"unisse","2nd_person_singular":"unisses","3rd_person_singular":"unisse","1st_person_plural":"unissions","2nd_person_plural":"unissiez","3rd_person_plural":"unissent"},"imperfect":{"1st_person_singular":"unisse","2nd_person_singular":"unisses","3rd_person_singular":"unît","1st_person_plural":"unissions","2nd_person_plural":"unissiez","3rd_person_plural":"unissent"}},"conditional":{"present":{"1st_person_singular":"unirais","2nd_person_singular":"unirais","3rd_person_singular":"unirait","1st_person_plural":"unirions","2nd_person_plural":"uniriez","3rd_person_plural":"uniraient"}},"imperative":{"present":{"2nd_person_singular":"unis","1st_person_plural":"unissons","2nd_person_plural":"unissez"}},"participle":{"present":"unissant","past":"uni"},"gerund":"unissant"}}},"usage_notes":{"explanation":"「unir」は、物理的な結合だけでなく、抽象的な意味での団結や協力も表します。再帰動詞「s'unir」は「団結する、協力する」という意味でよく使われます。","priority":"★★★"},"common_mistakes":{"examples":[{"incorrect":"*Je suis unir","correct":"Je vais unir / J'unirai","note":"動詞「unir」は助動詞を必要としません。未来形や複合過去形など、適切な活用形を使用してください。"},{"incorrect":"*unir à","correct":"unir avec / unir pour","note":"結合の対象を示す前置詞は、文脈に応じて「avec」(～と) または「pour」(～のために) を使用します。"}],"priority":"★★☆"},"level_frequency":{"frequency_lexique383":"4.44","priority":"★★☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"B1","text":"「Unir」は、フランス語で「結合する」「団結させる」という意味の動詞です。物理的な意味だけでなく、抽象的な意味でも使われます。例えば、「力を合わせる」や「国を統一する」といった文脈で使用されます。再帰動詞「s'unir」は「団結する」という意味で、より一般的に使われます。"},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"Il faut unir nos efforts pour réussir.","translation":"成功するためには、我々は努力を結合する必要がある。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"結合する、団結させる"},{"sentence":"Les deux pays ont décidé d'unir leurs forces militaires.","translation":"その二つの国は、彼らの軍事力を結合することを決定した。","type":"verb","meaning_category":"結合する、団結させる"},{"sentence":"Nous devons nous unir pour lutter contre ce problème.","translation":"我々はこの問題と戦うために団結しなければならない。","type":"verb (pronominal)","meaning_category":"団結する"}]}
